summary: "Hedge Knight Armor" is a lore friendly, stand alone, heavy armor set. This armor brings back memories of Oblivion with it's knight in shining armor feel. If you prefer an exquisite, royal looking armor, this set is for you.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PtjXl.png[/img]

[center]An armor mod by Hothtrooper44.[/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EQbnU.png[/img]
A hedge knight is a wandering knight without a master. Hedge knights are so named because they generally must sleep outdoors, under a hedge. Most hedge knights travel in search of employment and often attend jousts to make money and display their prowess in hopes of being hired. Less scrupulous hedge knights put their martial training to use by resorting to banditry.

"Hedge Knight Armor" is a lore friendly, stand alone, heavy armor set. This armor brings back memories of Oblivion with it's knight in shining armor feel. If you prefer an exquisite, royal looking armor, this set is for you.

The pieces are Steel Plate quality in armor value and weight. Powerful enough to use at any stage of the game, and appropriate to it's material. No god-mode items here folks, this is a lore friendly set.

The armor set requires the "Advanced Armors" perk to craft, and has equivalent crafting material requirements to Steel Plate armor.

This armor is heavy only. It was hand crafted for all races and both genders.

This mod is 100% stand alone and does not require another mod for it's use. That said, many may prefer it as it comes, but this is the first set I have released that I highly suggest the use of another mod with. I built this armor to mesh perfectly with "Winter is Coming" cloaks. The armor looks it's best when wearing a cape IMO, but I deferred to Nivea's masterful cloaks rather than adding my own. The cloak depicted in the screenshots is the "Timber Wolf" cloak. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13486]Get one of her cloaks here.[/url]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zQ9qs.png[/img][youtube]Y9di1qTXPEI[/youtube][img]http://i.imgur.com/zQ9qs.png[/img]

Feedback on the armor should be left in the comments section. I will read all the comments made and consider requests for alterations and potential fixes.

** If you like it, endorse it! **[/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/WLrBN.png[/img]
I would like to take this small space to thank the users of my mods, and the Nexus community at large. I am honored to be a part of this community, and to contribute to it. Thank you for your patronage of my work, whether it comes through comments, endorsements, or even a kind donation. You are the reason that I spend long hours of work bettering Skyrim. The Nexus community is the reason I continue to create mods. Thank you.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/OOsmG.png[/img]
If you wish to use this armor set for your mod, please ask me by message first.
I do wish to help other mods and the community at large with my work, so don't hold back from asking!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/KLoK0.png[/img]
hothtrooper44 - Hedge Knight Armor
Bethesda - Skyrim and it's assets
The heavy LaValette knight + Barbute meshes and textures are owned and copyrighted by CD Projekt and used here with permission. The Witcher is a trademark of CD Projekt. All rights reserved. http://www.cdprojekt.com/
L0rd-0f-War - his importation of Witch 2 models - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588
1000stenar - his awesome screenshots and ENB http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15386
Omesean - inspiration/help!
